Sequence Information.Peptide Name: LM4 (Lactomodulin fragment, Synthetic AMPs, XXA, UCLL1c)

Literature.Author: Mousa WK, Shaikh AY, Ghemrawi R, Aldulaimi M, Al Ali A, Sammani N, Khair M, Helal MI, Al-Marzooq F, Oueis E. 2024
Literature.Title: Human microbiome derived synthetic antimicrobial peptides with activity against Gram-negative, Gram-positive, and antibiotic resistant bacteria.

Sequence Information.Comments: Sequence analysis: APD analysis reveals that this sequence is similar (40%) toCr-ACP1A=D: 20%.Activity: active against S. aureus ATCC 25923 or MRSA BAA 2313 (MIC 2.6-3.5 uM),  C.difficile ATCC 43602 (NA), L.monocytogenes ATCC 15313 (NA), E.faecium VRE BAA 2317 (NA), E.coli ATCC 33694 (NA), P.aeruginosa BAA 1744 (NA), and S.enterica ATCC 13314 (NA). NA: not observed.
